message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1400000. Let me know if this is something you'd like to consider.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1300000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'm looking to get for the product. Let me know if this is something you'd like to consider.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but $1300000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll make a counteroffer of $1250000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I see in the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1250000. I'm willing to meet you at $1280000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer on this price point.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1240000, so I'll make a counteroffer of that amount. I believe this is a fair price for the product, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you at $1260000. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1200000 and $1260000, so I'll make a final counteroffer of $1220000. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

Bob, I understand that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get as close to my target price as possible. I'm willing to meet you at $1240000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate the time we've spent negotiating, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $1220000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1200000.
